title: FS/FT: Quinn Broad Leaf 350 raw. Pop 0 - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Quinn Broad Leaf 350 raw. Pop 0 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Asking $SOLD for the card. I don’t know how to price him to be honest, so if you are interested in buying him, let me know if the price is off.

Looking to trade this Quinn Broad Leaf 350 I got as part of a scrapbook lot last month.  It doesn’t fit my collection at all.

Card is listed as possible but unconfirmed on T206Resource but was confirmed a few years back through one of Ted’s threads here on N54. Regardless, there have not been any graded as both PSA and SGC list his pop as 0. I can’t find any sales of this front/back combo either.

So I really have no idea how to price it and instead am offering it up for trade. Looking for T206 EPDG HOFers or generally uncommon back cards. But I’d also consider swaps for the Big 4. I can do trade and cash either direction too.  Would love to hear your thoughts on the card or what you may have available for trade. Please PM me and we can talk.

Thanks for looking!  Hope we can make a deal.....

Jeff


[url=https://flic.kr/p/2icGt9m][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/49359134848_11effa0778_c.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2icKTE8][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/49359802647_69d4960c46_c.jpg[/img][/url]

Dropping price to $1150.

Really tough card!  Likely won’t come up again for a long time if ever.
One last drop to $995.  Really a great deal for a front/back combo that has never been graded.  Be the first!  Hahaha.
